title: Red marionette

After obtaining the various Christmas hats and scarves from Diango's workshop, players could take five boxes of baubles to a huge tree in the centre of Varrock. Item ID6867

Red marionettes were available during the rare drops during summer and in the 2013 Christmas event. After obtaining the various Christmas hats and scarves from Diango's workshop, players could take five boxes of baubles to a huge tree in the centre of Varrock. If lost, Diango in Draynor Village market can give you a new one.

This item can be stored in the toy box space of a costume room, as part of the 2005: Marrionette set. Ultimate Ironmen will be unable to retrieve individual pieces until the full set is stored.

The marionette can be operated to do 4 different moves, which are jump, walk, dance and bow.

Jump Walk Dance Bow

[[File:Red marionette detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Red marionettes''' were available during the rare drops during summer and in the [[2013 Christmas event]]. After obtaining the various Christmas [[hats and scarves]] from [[Diango]]'s workshop, players could take five boxes of baubles to a huge tree in the centre of [[Varrock]]. If lost, Diango in [[Draynor Village]] market can give you a new one.

{{Costume storage|toy box space|[[Marionette|2005: Marrionette]] set|set=true}}

The marionette can be operated to do 4 different moves, which are jump, walk, dance and bow.
